sentences_tone.text: Millie Bobby Brown taking a 'rest' between appearances and 'Stranger Things' filmingMillie Bobby Brown has been promoting "Stranger Things" seemingly nonstop lately and is now taking some time for herself.
Brown who plays the mysterious Eleven on the hit Netflix series posted an apology to fans on Instagram after having to cancel an appearance.
"I have had to cancel a Comic Con last minute which is something I've never never done and I'm planning on never doing again Brown said in the video.
I just think I've worked too hard and I have to rest as I've had a really long shoot and I'm still filming 'Stranger Things.'"
The 13-year-old has been seen hitting a string of red-carpet and high-profile events often alongside her fellow cast members.
